name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dynamic Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a strong focus on automation and infrastructure management utilizing **Ansible**, **Terraform**, and **Kubernetes**. My hands-on expertise with **Linux**, **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis** ensures high availability and performance of applications. I am proficient in CI/CD processes leveraging tools such as **FluxCD** and **ArgoCD**, allowing for seamless deployment and automation of infrastructure.

Additionally, my background includes in-depth experience with **networking fabric controllers**, **VMware vCenter**, and **NetApp ONTAP**, further enhancing my capabilities in managing large-scale systems. I have implemented robust monitoring and observability solutions through **OpenTelemetry** and orchestrated containerized applications with **Rancher** and **RKE2**, ensuring operational excellence.

With a foundation in full-stack development, I have effectively built high-performance solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have also led initiatives on enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities, thus delivering innovative technology solutions aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
